nav.div: Granville Central School District » News » Closure Reflection from Mr. Kelly

div.div: Closure Reflection from our Transportation Director, Mr. Kelly

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Closure Reflection from our Transportation Director, Mr. Kelly

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Today completes our second week of food deliveries. Many of the drivers have come back and stated what a rewarding experience this is to see the smiles on kids’ faces when we arrive. It has been a challenge to arrange every delivery in a reasonable amount of time, and we are covering many areas we have never been to before. I know for some it has given a whole new meaning to being a school bus driver, and many students are happy to see their regular driver doing so much more than bringing them to and from school. We have been all put to a totally new challenge and it has been accepted quite well. We will all get through this together and will hopefully sooner than later be back to our regular tasks!

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Together we will get through this tough time, and it's wonderful to be part of this Granville Community!

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
